42c027e4ff9730fbb3de84c1af0d2c506e41c3e4: Daniel Radcliffe gains access to £20 million fortune as he turns 18. He insists the money won't cast a spell on him. Radcliffe plans to be frugal and avoid extravagant spending. Despite his wealth, he aims to stay grounded and avoid tabloid scandals.
ee8871b15c50d0db17b0179a6d2beab35065f1e9:
- Mentally ill inmates housed on "forgotten floor" in Miami jail.
- Judge Steven Leifman advocates for long-term treatment over punishment.
- Leifman works to change system, redirect mentally ill inmates to mental health facility.
06352019a19ae31e527f37f7571c6dd7f0c5da37: Minneapolis bridge collapse survivors recount harrowing tales of escape and rescue efforts. Drivers describe free fall, chaos, and disbelief as bridge gives way. Emergency room physician rushes to scene to help injured. Survivors express shock and gratitude for being alive.
24521a2abb2e1f5e34e6824e0f9e56904a2b0e88: President Bush had five small polyps removed from his colon. The polyps were not worrisome and were sent for examination. Results are expected in two to three days. Bush is in good humor and will resume his activities.
7fe70cc8b12fab2d0a258fababf7d9c6b5e1262a: NFL suspends Michael Vick indefinitely without pay for dogfighting involvement. Vick to appear in court Monday for plea deal. Vick admits to participating in dogfighting ring and killing dogs. Vick agrees to cooperate with investigators and provide information.
a1ebb8bb4d370a1fdf28769206d572be60642d70:
5-year-old Youssif, a burn victim from Iraq, receives overwhelming support worldwide.
Children's Burn Foundation covers medical costs for Youssif's treatment in the US.
Family faces security risks in Iraq but finds new hope globally.
7c0e61ac829a3b3b653e2e3e7536cc4881d1f264:
Iraqi women turn to prostitution to survive due to violence and poverty.
Many feel forced into this path to provide for their children.
Humanitarian workers are trying to bring attention to this taboo issue.
f0d73bdab711763e745cdc75850861c9018f235d:
Key FARC commander "El Negro Acacio" killed in Colombian military air attack.
Medina Caracas managed FARC's cocaine trafficking network, indicted by U.S. since 2002.
He also faced charges of conspiring to kidnap U.S. oil workers in 1997.
5e22bbfc7232418b8d2dd646b952e404df5bd048:
White House press secretary Tony Snow will step down on September 14.
President Bush "sadly accepts" Snow's resignation and praises his contribution.
Snow, battling cancer, plans to leave for financial reasons but will continue speaking out.
613d6311ec2c1985bd44707d1796d275452fe156: Empty rocket launcher tube found on New Jersey lawn, deemed non-hazardous. Investigation underway by FBI and police. Launcher turned over to U.S. Army officials for further examination. Army officials unable to determine if launcher had been fired recently.
017d27d00eb43678c15cb4a8dd4723a035323219:
President Bush will use historical lessons to argue against pulling out of Iraq.
He will compare the war to Vietnam and other conflicts in Asia.
The White House is trying to reframe the debate over Iraq.
85f55a3e0dd672857aaaaa80954934a57b7a2fbf:
- Chronology of bombings and attempted bomb attacks in mainland UK since 1970s
- Series of IRA bombings in London and other parts of England
- Various attacks targeting public places and government offices
77d7c8cf2a9432e395d629371a12790c563c19f7: Carlos Alberto, scorer in FC Porto's 2004 Champions League final, joins Werder Bremen. He aims to win titles with his new club in Bundesliga. Bundesliga sees influx of Brazilian players, including Ewerthon and Ailton.
35f0e33de7923036a97ac245d899f990bda5e242: Vice President Cheney to serve as acting president during Bush's colonoscopy. Bush's last colonoscopy in 2002 found no abnormalities. Procedure to be supervised by Dr. Richard Tubb at Camp David. Small polyps may be removed during the colonoscopy.
2ad31cae96512af5105b9b23f9b681dc732b2605: A magnitude 4.2 earthquake shook the San Francisco area. About 2,000 customers were left without power. The quake was considered "light" and caused minimal damage. The shaking lasted about 50 seconds.
0d43b97000ff852282c89d8d105e41495c0ee9bd:
- No hope of finding six trapped miners alive in Utah coal mine.
- Mine Safety and Health Administration exhausted all options in rescue attempt.
- President Bush and Labor Secretary express sympathy for families of miners.
bf0cd4ccacd4fe045995338f4c44d9cf18000226:
- Bomb kills 14, wounds 60 in crowd waiting for Algeria's president.
- Explosion occurred in Batna, east of Algiers, near a mosque.
- No immediate claim of responsibility for the bombing in Algeria.
2f43e9dfaa43ffbddbce339a8b6403ddce43b38a:
David Beckham joins U.S. Major League Soccer's Los Angeles Galaxy team.
CNN explores Beckham's rise to football stardom and Hollywood transition.
Beckham's impact on U.S. soccer and his family's adjustment to Los Angeles.
eb68bc51ed4fc727a1af058192a3fef0916c91e7:
- Virus in Australian bees may be causing collapse of US colonies.
- Colony collapse disorder imperils crops dependent on bee pollination.
- Israeli Acute Paralysis Virus (IAPV) may be a factor in collapse disorder.
ad021a7924ee57491cee8576499ac196b1afeb23:
Customers line up to empty accounts at UK mortgage bank after bailout.
Fearful savers withdraw £1 billion amid global credit crunch concerns.
Bank reassures customers, but shares drop and government intervenes.
9d7fc7fd9ffbfecb1c458b9929fa02e6c3538368:
O.J. Simpson held without bail after arrest on robbery and assault charges.
Accused of directing armed robbery of sports memorabilia in Las Vegas hotel.
Alleged victims identified, including sports memorabilia collector and another man.
Investigators seeking four other men believed to have accompanied Simpson.
30cb674030b01014d2c87b92f09152857e249631: Nigeria's TV survival show suspended after contestant drowns in preparation. Contestant died suddenly in Shere Hills Lake. Show offers big prize money and celebrity opportunities.
d41dc7fc05273a37f0aceaf4f3e35a187f12653e:
Former government employee indicted for stealing nuclear materials and putting US at risk.
Materials were taken from East Tennessee Technology Park, and suspect appeared in federal court.
Suspect allegedly tried to sell classified material to undercover FBI agent.
fbc6a4d0697b2a3e8b549dcb1f80a8ce7bf47e34:
Chelsea waits on John Terry's fitness for Champions League match with Valencia.
Frank Lampard ruled out due to injury.
Michael Essien expected to play despite battling a leg injury.
0753a471e6908c35bcbc2daa37e21f3a8443b590:
- Organ trafficking and black market for organs in poorer countries
- Shortage of donated organs in rich countries leads to transplant tourism
- Lack of transparency and protection for donors in organ trade
08450c1bc03472825196be1acb02ac0e13bef939:
Lindsay Lohan's legal troubles raise questions about insurability for future movies.
Industry experts say any actor can be insured, but at a high cost.
Insurance terms for covering Lohan would likely be serious at this point.
Producers may face high deductibles or ask Lohan to put her salary into escrow.
7fa8d9beca50155fd3d71a9087a4311ce321c34b: Francesco Totti threatens to quit Italian Players Association over Serie A start date. Italian players feel ignored by football league's decision to start season on August 26. Totti argues for earlier start to allow players more rest and preparation. Serie A start date clashes with Italy's Euro 2008 qualifiers.
414a5b8ecbe189d2767c75b839775a1dcafaf4d3:
Blackwater USA denies allegations of unlawful arms activities in Iraq.
Federal prosecutors are investigating claims of illegal weapons purchases and sales.
Blackwater asserts no knowledge of improper weapons exporting by employees.
State Department resumes Blackwater's security operations in Iraq after civilian shootings.
cac7a712935380d74410a7cba8d406235d51249a:
- 5-year-old burned Iraqi boy meets favorite superhero, Spider-Man, at Universal Studios.
- Spider-Man gives boy hug, shows him tricks, and makes his day.
- Family enjoys day at Universal Studios, escaping chaos of life in Baghdad.
e9093ca0a82f2aba28cd2762942c04177cfbb000: Marine convicted in death of Iraqi civilian sentenced to demotion and discharge. Accused Marines claimed victim planned to detonate roadside bomb. Squad leader faces life in prison if convicted of murder.
55a6aabd120f0b18297f7efe22452f9b3aca0d8d: Prince Harry pays tribute to Princess Diana on 10th anniversary of her death. He describes her as "the best mother in the world" and recalls her love and laughter. The Bishop of London also praises Diana's public work and compassion. He urges to let her rest in peace and remember her with thanksgiving and compassion.
06bc2f0272d033b123e9eebbb221c62d7d51c283:
French Foreign Minister Bernard Kouchner warns of possible war with Iran over nuclear program.
Kouchner challenges convention and authority, known for humanitarian commitment and plain-speaking style.
France's new high-profile style under President Sarkozy includes warnings to Iran.
17e43e8e7d2bbbb237df78537d108c3fa917d9fb:
- Beethoven's "Für Elise" likely not written for anyone named Elise.
- Elton John's "Philadelphia Freedom" was a thank-you to Billie Jean King.
- The Kinks' "Lola" was inspired by a transvestite, possibly Candy Darling.
- Neil Sedaka's "Oh, Carol" was written for his high school flame, Carole King.
ddcdeb9bdd19fa23f9495c85d48eeee910f33102:
- Historic spending expected for political and issue-advocacy advertising in 2008 election cycle.
- Former Massachusetts Gov. Mitt Romney leads in TV ad spending.
- Estimated $3 billion could be spent on 2008 election advertising.
- Interest groups have already spent $6.2 million on TV ads this year.
ee0ba7928d8987f2cb21c9a2012a76730f77de45:
- Relatives arrive in Phuket to identify remains of plane crash victims.
- Most of the 89 killed were foreign nationals, with 36 bodies unidentified.
- Investigation into crash continues, with weather conditions suspected as a factor.
554fd99f28ae12472c5d99ef6383bb184744c25a:
Michael Moore and CNN's Sanjay Gupta argued about Gupta's report on Moore's film "Sicko."
Moore criticized Gupta's report, saying "the facts were fudged," but Gupta disputed this.
Both agreed on the premise of "Sicko": America's health-care system needs fixing.
9e141ebc1c06d483bf85f4e5c8b3c7bc2d00ea2f:
Some Democrats are wavering on House resolution labeling Turkey's treatment of Armenians as genocide.
Turkey threatened to block access to Incirlik Air Base after resolution passed House committee vote.
Pentagon preparing new supply routes for troops in Iraq if Turkey cuts off access.
c9160e2f5ce386dabb10517e7a5c0933c01a9546: Twelve-year-old Mohammed Rasoul, who lost his leg in Falluja, is heading to the United States for treatment. A charity in New York has arranged for surgery and treatment at a hospital in Philadelphia. Mohammed hopes to rebuild Falluja and become an architect after his treatment.
d256aee1a47eb5b489dee6fb72ab7f7d1483a37f:
India elects first female president, Pratibha Patil, in historic victory.
Patil's win seen as boost for women's rights in India.
Supporters celebrate as Patil wins two thirds of electoral college votes.
2fff2bc541ef34a6647dfa2e4294cdcc187e47b9:
More than 100 homes evacuated in San Diego landslide.
Mayor declares state of emergency, seeks government aid.
Hillside community warned of shifting ground for weeks.
677375a4c69e81ab623af7c06a6b0a8d03d6350e:
French charity tried to take children from Chad for adoption.
Most children are not Sudanese or orphans, aid agencies report.
Charity workers and journalists face charges of kidnapping and extortion.
Spanish flight crew and Belgian also arrested.
33530f97118cc905b05cb920671492c7bfdf3a3b:
Explorer discovers new island near Greenland, revealing effects of climate change.
Scientists warn of potential catastrophic consequences if global warming continues unchecked.
Debate continues over the causes and implications of the Earth's warming trend.
3c19a753303ae0d67b3ae28e070c0f4157ffc52d:
Enraged crowd drags body of Ethiopian soldier through streets of Mogadishu.
Gun battles with Islamic insurgents result in 19 deaths, including Ethiopian troops and civilians.
Ethiopian troops arrived in Somalia in 2006 to help weak Somali government.
9313988d26672c576f08e130c895edf20d8aa626: Suburban Chicago police sergeant's wife missing, treated as potential homicide. Husband is suspect. Judge orders exhumation of Drew Peterson's third wife. Investigators suspect foul play in both cases.
72f4a6670ec7ec915c83d58bb0ebf152b1605bb6:
Julia Vakulenko reaches first WTA Tour final at Bell Challenge in Quebec.
Vakulenko seeks first victory on WTA Tour after battling through semifinals.
Lindsay Davenport seeks second win since comeback, beats Vera Zvonareva in semifinals.
b73f50e29d5b2943eb315643bef8ee4e09f5605b:
Pakistani President Musharraf declared a state of emergency and arrested opposition leaders.
He suspended the constitution and dismissed the Pakistan Supreme Court's chief justice.
The emergency declaration was met with condemnation from within and outside the country.
f9689fb9656132e1c6d186851563f2b968643791: National Children's Museum COO arrested for distributing child pornography. Accused of sending images to undercover detective. Museum officials horrified and Singer suspended from post.
63831b842812b1a3d05b04904a10d160fe7ad2af: Chester Arthur Stiles appeared in court on charges of raping a 2-year-old girl. The total charges against Stiles are 23 felony counts. The girl's mother expressed relief at Stiles' arrest and plans to testify. Stiles' former girlfriends also spoke out about the case.
05688bac0e46542be65a6df240428a6f26c86fd0:
Dale Steyn takes career-best 5-34 in Proteas' tight grip on first test.
South Africa leads with 287 runs after New Zealand bowled out for 118.
Hashim Amla and Jacques Kallis share unbeaten stand of 159.
5ba0d22ccba29ac8a3c77da069165d6016f5a214:
- Enjoy summer by lazing in a hammock, cutting jeans into shorts, catching fireflies, and running on the beach.
- To cut jeans into shorts, mark desired length, fold, iron, and cut just under the crease.
- Catch fireflies by imitating female blinking pattern with a pen flashlight to attract males.
- Running on the beach can get you into great shape, but beware of hot sand.
